text: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا

translation.en.sahih: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy
translation.id.indonesian: Hai Yahya, ambillah Al Kitab (Taurat) itu dengan sungguh-sungguh. Dan kami berikan kepadanya hikmah selagi ia masih kanak-kanak,
